title: Export GitHub Wiki as PDF E-book
author: ousmanedev
content: readme.md wikitopdf bash script export github repo's wiki a -structured pdf ebook.requirementsgitpandoclatexinstallationdownload script file make executable:curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ousmanedev/wikitopdf/master/wikitopdf.sh -o wikitopdf.sh && chmod +x wikitopdf.shusage's very simple. example, export plataformatec/devise repository's wiki, just to :./wikitopdf.sh plataformatec/devisecontributionscontributions are more welcome.
